name: Twitter Retweeter Bot
description: A Twitter bot that retweets or likes messages from list users in the last n days

LIST_ID.desription: The list ID found in the URL (can be private or public)

EXCLUDE_REPLIES.description: Don't RT or like replies to tweets

INCLUDE_RETWEETS.description: Retweet users' retweets found in the list

INCLUDE_QUOTE_TWEETS.description: Retweet users' quote tweets found in the list

KEYWORDS.description: (Case insensitive) Only retweet when these phrases are in the message. Seperate phrases by commas.
KEYWORDS.value: new pod, new podcast, alert, new ep, episode #, ep #, clip

FROM_DAYS_AGO.description: The number of days to go back when finding messages
